ai-tha-ap386:0.3_0: As a result, he was hardened in the world,
ai-tha-ap386:2.2_0: whatever fruit he enjoyed the fruit,
ai-tha-ap386:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap386:2.4_0: and the fruit of good and results.
ai-tha-ap386:3.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-tha-ap386:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap386:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bāhumatī.
ai-tha-ap386:7.1_0: Among the fruit of good deeds, and a fourth part of the senior monks.
